com.tutego.jrtf

Class RtfRow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tutego.jrtf.RtfPara
      • com.tutego.jrtf.RtfRow

  • public abstract class RtfRow
extends RtfPara
    Defines properties of the hole row. The properties for a row, e.g. borders, are assigned to every cell.
